products.name: Elser AI
products.tagline: Create full anime shorts with just a prompt in minutes
products.description: Elser AI helps creators turn ideas into full anime story videos. Just enter an idea, Elser AI could create long-form videos with consistent characters, clear story flow, and cinematic styles, all from a single prompt. In long-form benchmarks, Elser achieves 30%+ higher character consistency than other AI video tools across 180+ scenes. Built for storytellers, animators, and creators who want more than short clips.
products.keywords: Elser AI, Create full anime shorts with just a prompt in minutes

products.name: Lexie
products.tagline: A Tamagotchi that turns language practice into a game
products.description: French numbers are ridiculous. Quatre-vingt-dix-neuf? That's "four-twenty-ten-nine" for 99. Meet Lexie: a tamagotchi-inspired game that makes French practice stick ‚Äì especially the ridiculous bits. It grows when you practice, evolves when you‚Äôre right, and doesn‚Äôt punish you for being wrong or missing a day. Fully offline, zero ads. French is free; extra languages are a one-time unlock.
products.keywords: A Tamagotchi that turns language practice into a game, Lexie

products.name: Funding Goal
products.tagline: Calculate how much you should raise and why
products.description: Most founders pick a fundraising number without really knowing if it makes sense. This funding goal calculator helps you figure out how much to raise based on your burn rate, runway, and plans. Instead of guessing, you get a clear number and the reasoning behind it. It‚Äôs a simple, free tool built for founders who want clarity before talking to investors.
products.keywords: Calculate how much you should raise and why, Funding Goal

products.name: Squair
products.tagline: Calm anxiety in 2 minutes with Navy SEAL breathing
products.description: Your phone gave you anxiety. Now it gives you calm. Squair brings science-backed breathing protocols to your pocket: Box Breathing for stress, Zen Button for panic attacks, 4-7-8 for sleep. The same techniques Navy SEALs use - now in your pocket. Works offline. Built for anxious founders, overwhelmed creators and anyone who‚Äôs tried 4 cups of coffee just to focus. Free to start. No pills. No meditation journeys. Just breathe.
products.keywords: Squair, Calm anxiety in 2 minutes with Navy SEAL breathing

products.name: MTV REWIND
products.tagline: 24/7 music video streaming-MTV when it actually played music
products.description: MTV stopped playing music videos 20 years ago. MTV REWIND brings back the golden era of music television - 35,000 videos spanning 1970-2025 across 8 channels (70s, 80s, 90s, 2000s, 2010s, 2020s, Yo! MTV Raps, Headbangers Ball). No ads. No algorithm. No login. Just press play and discover music the way it used to be - completely random, completely free. Built in 48 hours as a passion project. The nostalgia hits different.
products.keywords: 24/7 music video streaming, MTV when it actually played music, MTV REWIND

products.name: Meme? Yes
products.tagline: Stop Alt-Tabbing. The fastest way to find memes.
products.description: Stop Alt-Tabbing and find the perfect meme directly from your Chrome toolbar. Search, 1-click copy, and paste instantly into Discord or Slack with zero signups required.
products.keywords: Meme? Yes, Tabbing. The fastest way to find memes., Stop Alt

products.name: one elsewhere
products.tagline: Don‚Äôt touch. Stay focused.
products.description: It is a focus challenge. Start a run, put your phone down, and don‚Äôt touch it. Your ship keeps flying while you stay away from the screen. The moment you touch the phone ‚Äî the flight ends. One-tap start with a short countdown Achievements for milestones (minutes, planets, deep space) Ships to unlock and choose from Minimal, calm UI designed to disappear while you do real things Use it while working, studying, reading, writing, training, or doing anything that needs uninterrupted attention.
products.keywords: one elsewhere, Don‚Äôt touch. Stay focused.

products.name: FreeUpMyMac
products.tagline: A Mac Disk Cleaner. Fix Your "System Data" Storage
products.description: A Mac disk cleaner app that finally fixes the "System Data" problem. Find the cache, junks and logs eating your space and delete them with 1 click.
products.keywords: A Mac Disk Cleaner. Fix Your "System Data" Storage, FreeUpMyMac

products.name: Guessly
products.tagline: A daily mini guessing game that roasts you when you fail
products.description: Each day you get 3 riddles. Guess right and feel smart. Guess wrong and get roasted. No timers, no pressure. Just your ego on the line.
products.keywords: A daily mini guessing game that roasts you when you fail, Guessly

products.name: Bit Sketchy!
products.tagline: A simple drawing party game where no skill is required
products.description: Bit Sketchy! is a simple, in-person drawing party game I built as a personal project. One device with the app sits on the table to show the drawing prompts for everyone to draw. After the round is finished the secret judging criteria is revealed, and the discussion begins... It‚Äôs intentionally simple, not about drawing skill, and mostly an experiment to see whether the concept is fun. I‚Äôd love feedback from anyone who tries it. Available on the iOS & Mac App Stores
products.keywords: Bit Sketchy!, A simple drawing party game where no skill is required

products.tagline: IDE that *still* works with Claude Code & Antigravity sub

products.name: One Time Link
products.tagline: Securely share secrets in Slack with one-time links
products.description: One Time Link by Nurbak ‚Äì Share Secrets for Slack lets teams securely share sensitive information inside Slack. Instead of sending passwords, API keys, or credentials in plain text, it creates one-time links that self-destruct after opening. Secrets are never stored in readable form, conversations stay clean, and teams reduce the risk of leaks ‚Äî without changing their Slack workflows. Built for developers, DevOps, and growing teams who care about security, privacy, and simplicity.
products.keywords: time links, Securely share secrets in Slack with one, One Time Link
